ing: 15 graham crackers, broken into small pieces
des: "Use up some old graham crackers at the same time as creating a scrumptious treat!"
ins: In a saucepan over medium heat, combine the cocoa, butter, milk, and sugar. Bring to a boil, then cook for an additional 30 seconds. Remove from heat and stir in the peanut butter. Finally, stir in the crackers and nuts. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Chill or let stand until firm.
